channel.title: Apache on Apache Camel
channel.description: Recent content in Apache on Apache Camel

item.title: Camel AWS2 Components are here: what are the changes for end users?
item.description: In Camel 3.2.0 we’ll release the complete set of Camel AWS2 components. In Camel 3.1.0 we already have a bunch of AWS2 components living together with the original AWS components. The aim of this post is giving a full perspective of what will change for the end users and the roadmap for new features. New components Except camel-aws-xray, which is a particular component needing much more work to be migrated, all the original AWS components have been migrated to AWS SDK v2.

item.title: Apache Camel on top-5 in the ASF annual 2019 report
item.description: The ASF Annual 2019 Report includes 25 highlights where Apache Camel is referred twice as a top-5 project: 10. Top 5 Apache repositories by number of commits: Camel, Hadoop, HBase, Beam, and Flink; 20. GitHub traffic: Top 5 most active Apache sources –visits: Spark, Camel, Flink, Kafka, and Airflow;
